member.name: T:Esd.IO.Ntcan.CanBitRateMode
member.summary: Specifies the bit rate mode of a object.

member.name: F:Esd.IO.Ntcan.CanBitRateMode.EsdCiaTable
member.summary: Bit rate value according to ESD table (superset of CiA table).

member.name: F:Esd.IO.Ntcan.CanBitRateMode.DirectBtr
member.summary: Bit rate value is directly programmed into CAN controller BTR register.

member.name: F:Esd.IO.Ntcan.CanBitRateMode.NumericalValue
member.summary: Optimal values for the CAN controller BTR register are calculated based on the given numerical value in Bit/s.

member.name: F:Esd.IO.Ntcan.CanBitRateMode.CanonicalBtr
member.summary: Bit rate value given as canonical BTR register values.

member.name: F:Esd.IO.Ntcan.CanBitRateMode.None
member.summary: No bit rate configuration.

member.name: T:Esd.IO.Ntcan.CanControllerMode
member.summary: Specifies the operation mode of the CAN controller.

member.name: F:Esd.IO.Ntcan.CanControllerMode.Connected
member.summary: CAN controller operates normally (Tx active, Rx active) in the Classical CAN mode with the configured nominal bit rate and is connected to the CAN bus.

member.name: F:Esd.IO.Ntcan.CanControllerMode.ListenOnly
member.summary: CAN controller operates in listen only mode (Tx passive, Rx active) in the Classical CAN operation mode with with the configured nominal bit rate.

member.name: F:Esd.IO.Ntcan.CanControllerMode.AutoBaudrate
member.summary: CAN controller operates in bit rate detection mode (Tx passive, Rx active).

member.name: F:Esd.IO.Ntcan.CanControllerMode.Disconnected
member.summary: The CAN controller is not connected to the CAN bus (Tx passive, Rx passive)

member.name: T:Esd.IO.Ntcan.CanBitRateTable
member.summary: Common CAN bit rates.
member.remarks: This enumeration is a superset of the bit rates defined by the CAN in Automation (CiA). The CiA bit rates are marked with a prefixed 'Cia'.

member.name: F:Esd.IO.Ntcan.CanBitRateTable.Cia1000KBit
member.summary: Bit timing of 1000 KBit/s according to CiA specification

member.name: F:Esd.IO.Ntcan.CanBitRateTable.Esd666666Bit
member.summary: Bit timing of 666.66 KBit/s

member.name: F:Esd.IO.Ntcan.CanBitRateTable.Cia500KBit
member.summary: Bit timing of 500 KBit/s according to CiA specification

member.name: F:Esd.IO.Ntcan.CanBitRateTable.Esd333333Bit
member.summary: Bit timing of 333.33 KBit/s

member.name: F:Esd.IO.Ntcan.CanBitRateTable.Cia250KBit
member.summary: Bit timing of 250 KBit/s according to CiA specification

member.name: F:Esd.IO.Ntcan.CanBitRateTable.Esd166666Bit
member.summary: Bit timing of 166.66 KBit/s

member.name: F:Esd.IO.Ntcan.CanBitRateTable.Cia125KBit
member.summary: Bit timing of 125 KBit/s according to CiA specification

member.name: F:Esd.IO.Ntcan.CanBitRateTable.Cia100KBit
member.summary: Bit timing of 100 KBit/s according to CiA specification

member.name: F:Esd.IO.Ntcan.CanBitRateTable.Esd66666Bit
member.summary: Bit timing of 66.66 KBit/s

member.name: F:Esd.IO.Ntcan.CanBitRateTable.Cia50KBit
member.summary: Bit timing of 50 KBit/s according to CiA specification

member.name: F:Esd.IO.Ntcan.CanBitRateTable.Esd33333Bit
member.summary: Bit timing of 33.33 KBit/s

member.name: F:Esd.IO.Ntcan.CanBitRateTable.Cia20KBit
member.summary: Bit timing of 20 KBit/s according to CiA specification

member.name: F:Esd.IO.Ntcan.CanBitRateTable.Esd12500Bit
member.summary: Bit timing of 12.5 KBit/s

member.summary: Bit timing of 10 KBit/s according to CiA specification

member.summary: Bit timing of 800 KBit/s according to CiA specification

member.summary: Bit timing of 83.3 KBit/s

member.name: F:Esd.IO.Ntcan.CanBitRateTable.Cia2000KBit
member.summary: Bit timing of 2000 KBit/s (CAN FD data phase)

member.summary: Bit timing of 4000 KBit/s (CAN FD data phase)

member.summary: Bit timing of 5000 KBit/s (CAN FD data phase)

member.summary: Bit timing of 8000 KBit/s (CAN FD data phase)

member.summary: Bit timing of 10000 KBit/s (CAN FD data phase)

member.name: T:Esd.IO.Ntcan.CanBitRateDetails
member.summary: Detailed bit rate register configuration of a CAN controller.

member.name: P:Esd.IO.Ntcan.CanBitRateDetails.IsValid
member.summary: Gets a value indicating if the instance data is valid.
member.value: true if the data is valid; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Esd.IO.Ntcan.CanBitRateDetails.BitRate
member.summary: Configured (nominal) CAN bit rate in Bit/s.

member.name: P:Esd.IO.Ntcan.CanBitRateDetails.Clock
member.summary: Clock frequency of the CAN controller.

member.summary: Actual deviation of configured bit rate in (% *
